column2: what are types of geofence notificaitons
column5: The geofence notifications can be categorized based on location selection and user action:  1. **Location-Based Categories:**    - **Single Location:** Sends notifications when users enter or exit a specific geographic point.    - **Group of Locations:** Sends notifications when users enter or exit any of the interconnected locations in a defined group, useful for businesses with multiple branches.  2. **User Action-Based Categories:**    - **Entry or Exit:** Notifications can be triggered either when the user enters or exits the location.    - **Frequency of Notifications:** You can configure whether notifications are sent every time the user enters or exits, or only once per entry or exit.  Additionally, you have the option to limit the notifications to a specific device, ensuring messages are only sent to the device that enters or exits the location.  ğŸ“„ **Kaynak belge**: [netmera-user-guide-messages-geofence-push.txt](https://user.netmera.com/netmera-user-guide/messages/geofence-push)
